results.name: Index of n as m-gonal number for the smallest possible m (=A176774(n)).
link: Michel Marcus, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Polygonal Number.
program: (PARI) f(n) = {k=3; while (! ispolygonal(n, k), k++); k; } \\ A176774
